concept.title: Adding an image
concept.shortdesc: Adding an image to DITA document using oXygen XML.

conbody.p:
To insert an image:
press Enter and select image (wizard) and add a URL.
Click on Insert a reference to an image icon in the task bar and add a URL.
Note that accessible documents require Figure title and Alternate text. You can add a title by right clicking on the image and selecting Edit attributes.
